attributes.title: This app gave me COVID-19 🥵🤢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and right when I opened I I saw the most HORRID and HORRENDOUS sight I had ever seen. A Cheeto man with crusty hair stared me right in the eyes and threatened that if I didn’t inject myself with cleaning supplies, he would give me covid 19. Obviously I didn’t want to die but soon enough the bad Cheeto man gave me corona and threatened to sell me into s*x tr*fici*g. I quickly deleted the app in fear for my life 😩😞😰

attributes.title: Name man👁👄👁💧
attributes.review: Oh to see with my eyes... my name Jack dumbfurt and I’m 56 years old and I just wanted to share my political opinion. When I opened the app there was a naked Cheeto man doing disgusting things it started glitching and next thing YOU KNOW I SEE A NAKED PICTURE OF DONALD TRUMP please take this app down it’s been very offensive to all the men with small penis’s because of what D.trump had looked like with his small penis.

attributes.title: This app is horrible!!!!
attributes.review: I tried spread my fascist white supremacy ideas and this app was horrible.🤢Too many glitches for me to actually post my hate filled speech!! 😖Every time I would try to post one of my toxic white male supremacy posts, the screen would take forever to load!!!!! Horrible app I will not recommend anyone to download this!👿🙅🏽‍♂️💥

attributes.title: poopie
attributes.review: Just the login screen was enough to send me ibto a 4 week long none stop vomit. I had to go to the hospital because just seeing the cheetos face makes me confulse. Im barely able to write this review without passing out. The therapist I had to start seeing after this traumatic incident warned me not to write this but I must warn everybody of the dangers that this app can produce!

attributes.title: absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: i hated this app. so gross, so much ORANGE. why was there so much orange???? i thought this was one of the worst apps in the history of ALL apps, and quite frankly, i was ASHAMED for HIM. that shame didn’t come easily. poorly designed, poorly kept, and bugs everywhere. i can’t believe it’s still real! please, save your time and don’t vote- i mean download this app :)

attributes.title: Oh my goodness.
attributes.review: This app is the worst I’ve ever used. I had downloaded it for my friend because she wanted to know more about Trump. However, I showed it to my friend. But, on the loading screen, it showed a disgusting Cheeto man. My friend is now traumatized and I’m still trying to calm them down. Absolutely horrible and I do not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: no❤️🙀
attributes.review: i had the most horrible experience with this app. i opened the app to see a racist, homophobic, transphobic and many other labels that i’m not allowed to type on here😻. then my phone got over heated from seeing all this no sense and it vanished🙀🙀🙀🙀 now i’m emotionally scarred and out a phone (i’m currently writing from my EcoTank ET-4760 All-in-One Cartridge-Free Supertank Printer) Thanks a lot👿👿👿😾😾😾😾😿😿

attributes.title: Horrible 👊🏼
attributes.review: I felt as if everyone there were out to get me. I got multiple threats coming from this Cheeto man (he was very orange 🍊 )who is trying to take away my basic human right 😔👊🏼 as y’all know I kinda want to live sooo🤷🏽‍♀️ also as soon as I downloaded this app it said something about a virus (probably a hacker 🤪)👀 idk could me nothing right 👁👄👁🤩🏳️‍🌈💘💗💅🏼😹🧚🏼‍♀️🦋🪐✨🌈🌥🍊🥕

attributes.title: Extremely disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this to support our president but as soon as it downloaded my phone shut down and I couldn’t use it when I finally got it to work I couldn’t open any of my apps except for this one I deleted the app and everything fixed itself             👁👄👁

attributes.title: ✨💅🤚 save your time
attributes.review: This app is super fun to make fun of and all you can do is laugh, 🤣🖕🏽🤡 why tf y’all got to show how much you support him, nobody gives a 🖕🏽you all are just needy people with nothing else to do except hope the annoying orange gets re elected, so Kyle and Karen go take care of your 4 kids with practice tonight and don’t worry about this sick app
